author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Removed some other deprecation warnings popping out in `CMSSW_12_4_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2022-05-04-2300` (I guess after https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37592 was merged).
Technical, part of the migrations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404.
Profited to clean-up headers and merging plugin header with implementations.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles, no warnings seen after merging.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: remove some more deprecated API warnings
